Intelligent automation of your prospecting on LinkedIn
Generate new qualified leads and reduce your prospecting time by more than 80% !


⭐  Introduction:
Lipcat is a cloud based application that allows you to fully automate your prospecting tasks, in a secure and efficient way.
Lipcat is safe and easy to use. All you need to do is select your type of campaign, add a LinkedIn search link, and watch your business grow!



Why choose Lipcat? 🥇

⏱ Use Lipcat! It's easy and fast !

🎯 Automatically prospect or hunt: tap into and connect with millions of pre-qualified LinkedIn contacts!

📢 Communicate with your network, which is usually “under-exploited”: automatically send personalized messages to all your rank 1 contacts (news, webinar invitation, etc.)

🚀 With SmartCat, increase your response rate: target only the contacts who will respond to you, thanks to Artificial Intelligence

📊 Monitor your activity and that of your teams thanks to intuitive dashboards.

📞 All this with very responsive support (within 24 hours)!
